post.body: hear=year
congratulations to you both - that's very happy news at this time of hear, especially.
congratulations!
g'night!
congratulations!
love the live chat.
Love simple, clean decorations like that. Might have to try some inspired by those photos before the in-laws get here Sunday.
pretty!
do you really carry around a drowned polar bear? sounds heavy.
thanks! :)
blog update, please? at least e-mail update?
wow, that was easy! consider yourself blogged tomorrow. :)
we don't have one here - lame-o - and i refuse to go to wal-mart. oh well.
yay! congrats!
no, i tried to send some digital prints through their web site to print out - my quick and dirty solution when i'm in a hurry
wow, i didn't even notice the price. Those are awesome!
those are gorgeous!
oh! you totally just answered my question about what beautiful bright thing i could see next to the moon tonight :)
i'm not really sure what that means, but it made me laugh out loud.
OK, good to know. I thought it would be a good idea (and by that I mean, I want one), but I wasn't sure if others use them
is a gardener's notebook something you would ever use? with room for notes, grid paper for sketching ideas, etc.
absolutely! i love to garden, but i kill everything.
ha, thanks. don't tell my boss. :)
oh, thank you those are gorgeous!
oh, i love that! it's so cold here, and that would be just the thing. nice find!
can you do that link again? i want to see, but it's not clickable :)
sweet! let me know if you have any questions. :)
aww thanks!
working #oneword
posted a new green notebook tonight (blue one already sold!) http://tinyurl.com/3u56vk
there's nothing that bums me out more than a bland christmas cookie.
sold and relisted the lazy daisy notecard set! http://tinyurl.com/4s2pv5
hoping it snows so hard tomorrow i can't come to work. wishful thinking? just a little.
reading Poppytalk's blog post on Scrapbooks: An American history http://poppytalk.blogspot.com/
check out my cards on Neato Stuff: http://www.neatostuff.com/
new blog post: more on my new notebooks! http://katieblairdesigns.blogspot.com/
my local walgreens web site says photo pick-up is temporarily unavailable. FAIL.
i'm working on a gardener's notebook - all you gardeners, is that something that would interest you?
man, twitter is rockin' tonight! excellent distraction while i'm at work. :)
just renewed these pretty little notecards: http://tinyurl.com/6338gj
